amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the spending reduction account), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds may be used by the Federal Aviation Administration to institute an administrative or civil action (as defined in section 47107 of title 49, United States Code) against the sponsor of the East Hampton Airport in East Hampton, NY.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Administrator of the FAA to institute an administrative or civil action or disposition of penalties against the sponsor of East Hampton Airport in East Hampton, NY.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zeldin amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Zeldin amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Zeldin.
